data.persona: I am a very large mammal. I have a lot of fur and a lot of body fat and muscle. I need to eat a lot of food including river beds full of salmon. I usually hibernate and wake up even hungrier than before.
data.description:
You are in the {}.
Dark and spooky at first sight for those who don't understand, but majestic after taking a closer look. The walls of the hallways and tomb rooms are made of a dark precious, priceless metal.  Ornaments of gold and silver sculptures are covering the tombs that contain the corps of those who have past away while there voices still sing the grime anthem of death in the lightless corridors.
There's a tapestry, a tomb, and a sculpture here.
The patron is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a thick layer of fur.

data.short_motivation: i want the jewelry because it looks valuable
data.mid_motivation: i want to exchange the jewelry for large amounts of food
data.long_motivation: i want to have lots of food to eat so i can get ready for hibernation

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: eat the last of my food

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get lots of food for money
